item.title: Hugo Helpful Commands
item.description: Hugo its a very useful framework to build websites in the geekiest way possible but at the same time I consider it very simple (depending on your skill set). This is a list of the most useful and only commands that I use: Create a new site Note: Remember you need to be in the parent folder, it will create the new folder and all the Hugo files inside of it.
